CustomField.description: Time taken for the work order to be closed after it was scheduled bucket. Used for reporting purpose
CustomField.formula: IF (SVMXC__TimeBetweenScheduleAndClose__c <=2, "Less Than 2 hours", IF (SVMXC__TimeBetweenScheduleAndClose__c <= 6, "2 To 6 hours", IF (SVMXC__TimeBetweenScheduleAndClose__c <= 10, "6 to 10 hours", "Over 10 hours")))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Time taken for the work order to be closed after it was scheduled bucket. Used for reporting purpose
CustomField.label: Time Between Schedule And Close Bucket
